text:
Sofiene Chaari (; born July 31, 1962 – August 22, 2011) was a Tunisian actor who is famous for his role of Sbouï in the sitcom "Choufli Hal". On television, he plays in the series Mnamet Aroussia, Chez Azaïez, and Loutil. In 2005, he obtained the role of Sboui in the television series Choufli Hal, a role which made him popular with the Tunisian public. He plays there alongside Mouna Noureddine and Kamel Touati.
He also hosts a children's program, the Sofiane show, broadcast on national television.
